title: Graduate Hospital Bi-Level 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom
description:
The Apartment at 1638 South Street Apartment is a Luxury Bi-Level Two-Floor Apartment with Two Balcony Decks and Two Bedrooms. Located centrally in Center City/Graduate Hospital/Rittenhouse area in Philadelphia, PA. To schedule a time to see the apartment, please respond directly to this posting via email. This is a Bi-level Two-Floor luxury apartment with Two Balcony/Deck Spaces in Center City/Graduate Hospital area of Philadelphia at 1638 South Street. This apartment comes with Two Bedrooms (One Large Master bedroom, One Smaller bedroom), Two Full Bathrooms, Two Balcony/Decks, Kitchen, Dishwasher, Living Room, Dryer and Washer Units, Central Air, High Quality Wood Hardwood Floors, and more.
This apartment is in a prime and centrally located area in the beautiful and trendy neighborhood of Center City Philadelphia, west of Broad Street (also known as the ever popular "Graduate Hospital" area of the city). It is a walker's paradise and is in walkable distance to Rittenhouse Square Park, Center City designer shopping, Liberty Place Mall, five star restaurants, and supermarket/grocers. Just blocks away from Broad Street "Avenue of the Arts" Theaters & Performing Arts Venues and Philadelphia's City Hall. It is truly in the Heart of Philadelphia. Along this South Street corridor are a mix of restaurants, eateries, coffee shops, dry cleaners, fitness studio, convenience stores, and other local businesses. Pediatrician office (Center City Pediatrics) is situated one block down. A beautiful playground/park for recreation is just a two block walk south. The renowned Children's Hospital of Philadelphia and Hospitals in the University of Pennsylvania network is just a mere 7 minute drive west to University City where you can find University of Pennsylvania and Drexel University among other institutions. This is one of the most desired locations in Philadelphia to live and is extremely commuter-friendly, family-friendly, and a trendy area for working professionals, couples, and individuals of all backgrounds who love to live and work within a vibrant and lively area while still having a residential feel in a peaceful neighborhood with nearby parks/green spaces. It is right by SEPTA Broad Street Line (Lombard-South station), and connecting SEPTA bus lines.
1638 South Street Bi-Level Apartment

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Rare 1 BDRM in historic Old City w/ outdoor space
description:
Charming one bedroom apartment for rent in the heart of historic Philadelphia with its own private deck!  The second floor unit is located along Gallery Row in Old City, above an active art studio, and is walking distance to restaurants, waterfront trails, museums, outdoor space and convenience shopping.
The unit was renovated in 2021, which included a new kitchen and bathroom, and only the owners have lived there since.   It features brand new appliances, including a washer/dryer, along with generous closet space and natural light from both ends.   The private deck out back provides a quieter escape from the city bustle, perfect for BBQ's or just enjoying the sunlight.   The unit has central air conditioning and gas/electric service are considered separate.    Pets OK with additional deposit, refundable at move-out.    Located 3 blocks from Market-Frankford Line and immediate access to ON/OFF ramps for I-95.
The ideal renter would be someone who lives a quieter lifestyle and/or may work from home, as there are artists and families with young children living in all directions who do the same.  \But for that someone who really loves the history and vibrancy of Old City, this is a rare opportunity to live in the heart of the best part and enjoy being part of a small building/family!
Available in September.
SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY, by email.
REPEAT:  SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY.

title: Charming Three-Story Townhouse near Sutcliffe Park
description:
Hello, I am moving out and trying to help the landlord to find someone to replace me here. This is a charming Three-Story Townhouse near Sutcliffe Park. There are two BIG bedrooms (each 220 sqft) available in the house. One of them is fully furnished (see photos) with a bed, bedroom bench with storage, a big drawer, and 2 nightstands. You can rent each bedroom individually or as a couple. There are two full bathrooms. The common area including the kitchen, the living room, and the dining room is also fully furnished (see photos). There is a beautiful backyard deck that connects with the kitchen where you can enjoy the sunset every afternoon. This house is located in a very convenient location, 3 mins to the Conshohocken Train Station, 1 min to Fayette Street, 5 mins walking to local bars and restaurants, and 19 mins to Center City.
You will be responsible for the rent + electricity and gas. Internet, TV cable, water, trash, and lawn mowing included.
If you rent only one bedroom, you only have to pay half of the electricity and gas bills. If interested, please contact me at  show contact info
or email me.
